EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Cloud Native Seminar_Singapore_Q415.Reminder email
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Pivotal Cloud Native Seminar is tomorrow 11/19
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are sending you a friendly reminder that you are registered for The Pivotal Cloud Native Seminar. The seminar will take place tomorrow, November 19, 2015. Please see event details below
Date: November 19, 2015 Time: 8:30 - 13:30 Location: Level 69, Equinox Complex, Swiss√¥tel The Stamford, 2 Stamford Road, Singapore 17882
{{my.Save The Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us for the seminar! The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io/news-events>.
